subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Kwadwo Poku scored two second-half goals to help New York City F.C. tie the host Columbus Crew, 2-2, in a game delayed because of a thunderstorm.
snippet: Kwadwo Poku scored two second-half goals to help New York City F.C. tie the host Columbus Crew, 2-2, in a game delayed because of a thunderstorm.
